attributes.description:
Welcome to Auto Investments, where we sell reliable cars in all price ranges.
We aim to provide you with exceptional service, sound financial advice and affordable quality. 
All our customers can expect the very highest standards of sales and service excellence. 
Visit our Full Range of vehicles at www.autoi.co.za
Please note, advertised sales prices does not include License and Registration fees, nor Dealer Admin Fees.

attributes.agent_name: Motus Ford Diep River Used Cars
attributes.description:
Balance of Active Service Plan of 49months/61500km  Scheduled Service Plan..

 All our vehicles have passed our stringent 160-point check
Our vehicles have a full-service history
None of our vehicles have been registered for more than 5 years old
Our vehicles have a maximum mileage of 120 000km
We get our cars’ mileage readings verified
Our vehicles come with the balance of Manufacturer’s Warranty - or a new warranty
The Balance of the Service Plan and Maintenance Plan is included
We offer Roadside Assistance for 12 months
We accept all trade-ins
We offer test drives on all our used vehicles

attributes.title: 2022 Ford EcoSport 1.0 EcoBoost Titanium Auto

attributes.agent_name: Motus Ford Airport Park Germiston Used Cars
attributes.description:
Finance can be arranged, Excludes administration, delivery and license registration fees, 160 point quality check, Very neat, Trade-ins accepted, Test drives welcome, Nationwide delivery.

Finance is available with all the major banks as we are approved dealers. Please come and visit our Used Car Manager and our Business Manager, they will be able to arrange a Taylor made Deal structure to match your pocket over a lovely cup of coffee at our Bistro. Trade-ins welcome and we pay top prices for good clean vehicles. First time to finance, our Finance and Insurance Manager will assist you step by step throughout your process. There are great warranty options available for this vehicle and other great products. Should you require further information or you would like to arrange a test drive please do not hesitate to contact us.
